title: K8s Agents Service
description: A production-ready Kubernetes deployment platform for AI agents built with LangGraph, FastAPI, and Streamlit. Features comprehensive Helm charts with dual-architecture deployment, ArgoCD GitOps integration, YugabyteDB with pgvector for RAG capabilities, and automated cron jobs for vector database maintenance. Includes both Streamlit and Next.js UIs with multi-agent support for resume assistance and web research.

title: Analyzing the Effectiveness of Large Language Models on Text-to-SQL Synthesis
description: Investigating various approaches to using Large Language Models (LLMs) for Text-to-SQL program synthesis, focusing on the outcomes and insights derived. Employing the popular Text-to-SQL dataset, spider, the goal was to input a natural language question along with the database schema and output the correct SQL SELECT query.

title: Research Podcasts Platform
description: A distributed research analysis system using RAG to process academic papers from arXiv and generate AI-powered podcast summaries. Features event-driven architecture with Kafka for reliability, YugabyteDB for distributed SQL storage with pgvector, high-quality TTS audio generation, and real-time progress tracking via server-sent events. Includes semantic similarity-based recommendations and comprehensive Kubernetes deployment.

title: Custom Bluesky feed in a home lab environment
description: A specialized ATProto feed service for Brandon Sanderson's Cosmere universe fans. Features intelligent filtering using comprehensive keyword sets, trending and chronological post combination, Kubernetes microservices architecture with YugabyteDB, and home lab deployment with SSL/TLS termination. Includes web API service, firehose processing, scheduler service, and automatic DNS management with Cloudflare.

title: Web-based text-to-speech document reader
description: A comprehensive document reader with TTS capabilities supporting EPUB, PDF, TXT, MD, and DOCX formats. Features real-time read-along experience with highlighted text, audiobook creation and export (M4B format), mobile PWA support, customizable TTS settings, and local-first architecture using IndexedDB. Compatible with multiple TTS APIs including Kokoro-FastAPI, Orpheus-FastAPI, and OpenAI.

title: Using Large Language Models for Text-to-SQL Synthesis
description: This project fine-tunes a local large language model (LLM) WizardCoder-15B with QLoRA on a custom Spider training dataset to create a Text-to-SQL LLM. The resultant model, achieves 61% execution accuracy, incorporating database context for validation.

title: TuneTidy iOS App
description: A React Native iOS app that enhances Spotify with advanced playlist management and analytics. Features comprehensive playlist sorting by audio features (danceability, energy, tempo, etc.), top tracks/artists/albums analysis across multiple time ranges, AI-generated playlist cover art using DALL-E, real-time playlist reordering with progress tracking, and OAuth 2.0 authentication with PKCE.

title: TuneTidy Web App
description: A comprehensive React.js web application for Spotify playlist management and music analytics. Features advanced playlist sorting by multiple criteria including audio features (acousticness, danceability, energy, etc.), listening statistics with time-based analysis, playlist editing capabilities, and user authentication via Spotify OAuth. Built with Chakra UI and deployed on Netlify.

title: Artificial Intelligence Research
description: Written in 2021 (before the AI craze). A research paper posing the question: Why are Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) Important for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence?

title: Manacala Game GUI Application
description: Created with Qt Creator using C++.

title: Shoots and Ladders GUI Application
description: Created with Qt Creator using C++.
